name: Super Dead Mall (LOWREZJAM ENTRY)
description:
Programming, art and design by Skydevilpalm. https://twitter.com/skydevilpalm 

Music and sound effects by Cactusbear https://twitter.com/thecactusbear

Tools used -

 Stencyl http://www.stencyl.com/ 

 Pyxel Edit http://pyxeledit.com/

Controls:  

WASD for movement.

Hold "S" to crouch. 

Hold "SHIFT" to run. 

Press "SPACE" to jump. 

Hold "W" to pan the camera up.Objective :

Get all those loose arcade tokens, jump on haunted cups to defeat them, avoid ghosts by ducking or jumping over them, & get to the end!
